summary: June 25 is the 176th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
Karim Matmour   is an Algerian professional footballer. He currently plays as an attacking midfielder for Al-Arabi SC.
An Algerian international since 2007, Matmour featured at the 2010 FIFA World Cup and 2010 Africa Cup of Nations. As of July 2013, he has won 30 international caps and scored 2 goals.
title: Karim Matmour
